pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Tuesday, January 4, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings

8:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will receive his COVID‑19 booster vaccine at a pharmacy.

Note for media:

  • Restricted pooled coverage

The Prime Minister will receive a COVID‑19 briefing from Chief Public Health Officer of Canada Dr. Theresa Tam.

Closed to media

The Prime Minister will speak with the Premier of British Columbia and Chair of the Council of the Federation, John Horgan.
